loads header of NanoSurf AFM NID file and returns parameters for particular image

read.NanoSurf_header.Rd

loads header of NanoSurf AFM NID file and returns parameters for particular image

read.NanoSurf_header(filename, imageNo = 1)

Arguments

filename

filename including path
imageNo

image number to get data on

Value

list

Examples

filename = system.file("extdata", "NanoSurf_20160301.nid",package="nanoscopeAFM")
read.NanoSurf_header(filename, 1)
#>                  Version               GroupCount               Image size 
#>                      "2"                      "2"                   "10µm" 
#>           Scan direction                Time/Line                   Points 
#>                     "Up"                    "1 s"                   "128 " 
#>                    Lines                  X-Slope                  Y-Slope 
#>                   "128 "                    "0 °"                    "0 °" 
#>                 Rotation                    X-Pos                    Y-Pos 
#>                    "0 °"                    "0 m"                    "0 m" 
#>                  Z-Plane       Const. Height-Mode                     Date 
#>                    "0 m"               "Disabled"             "01-03-2016" 
#>                     Time                 Setpoint                   P-Gain 
#>               "18:36:58"                   "50 %"                 "10000 " 
#>                   I-Gain                   D-Gain                  P-Gain2 
#>                  "1000 "                     "0 "                     "0 " 
#>                  I-Gain2                  D-Gain2              Tip voltage 
#>                  "1000 "                     "0 "                    "0 V" 
#>            Feedback mode           Feedback algo.          Vibration freq. 
#>                   "Free"           "Adaptive PID"             "187.396kHz" 
#>          Vibration ampl.         Excitation ampl.              Error range 
#>                  "100mV"                  "268mV"                    "5 V" 
#>         Ampl. Ctrl. mode  Measurement environment                 Op. mode 
#>              "Free Amp."                    "Air"          "Dynamic Force" 
#>          Cantilever type                Head type                Scan head 
#>                  "ACL-A"                "EZ2-AFM" "Uncal_EZ2-AFM 110u.hed" 
#>      Laser working point        Deflection offset            Software ver. 
#>                   "0.0%"                   "0.0%"                "3.3.0.3" 
#>            Firmware ver.           Controller S/N         Controller Board 
#>                "3.3.0.0"             "023-08-554"                      "2" 
#>         AFM Basic Module       AFM Dynamic Module               USB Module 
#>                      "3"                      "2"                      "3" 
#>      Scripting Interface      Spectroscopy Module       Lithography Module 
#>                      "1"                      "1"                      "1"
